00026 #include "BasicVRTPacket.h"
00027 #include "VRTEvent.h"

00029 namespace vrt {
00030   using namespace std;
00031 
00036   class VRTEventListener : public VRTObject {
00037     private: void (*_receivedPacket ) (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p);
00038     private: void (*_sentPacket     ) (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p);
00039     private: void (*_errorOccurred  ) (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t);
00040     private: void (*_warningOccurred) (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t);
00041 
00043     public: VRTEventListener ();
00044 
00052     public: VRTEventListener (void (*receivedPacket ) (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p),
00053                               void (*sentPacket     ) (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p),
00054                               void (*errorOccurred  ) (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t),
00055                               void (*warningOccurred) (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t));
00056 
00058     public: VRTEventListener (const VRTEventListener &l);
00059 
00061     public: ~VRTEventListener ();
00062 
00067     public: virtual void receivedPacket (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p);
00068 
00073     public: virtual void sentPacket (const VRTEvent &e, const BasicVRTPacket *p);
00074 
00080     public: virtual void errorOccurred (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t);
00081 
00087     public: virtual void warningOccurred (const VRTEvent &e, const string &msg, const VRTException &t);
00088   };
00089 } END_NAMESPACE
